thread.title: Man arrested for kidnapping, murder after burnt body found in street
thread.title_full: Man arrested for kidnapping, murder after burnt body found in street | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man arrested for kidnapping, murder after burnt body found in street
text:
Cape Town - A 32-year-old man has been arrested in connection with a mob justice incident which led to the death of a man whose badly burnt body was found in Mfuleni last month.
The suspect is expected to appear in the Blue Downs Magistrate’s Court on Wednesday, said police spokesperson Constable Noloyiso Rwexana.
The victim's body was found in Nkonjani Street, Mfuleni - which is about 40km from Cape Town - on September 7.
“The body of a man aged about 25-years-old was found naked with burn marks on his body,” Rwexana said.
